WifiEvent¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Wifiservice

Description:

Represents the pointer to a Wi-Fi event callback for station and hotspot connection, disconnection, or scan.

If you do not need a callback, set the value of its pointer to NULL.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0
